event.title: February 17, 2006, the World Health Organisation officially declared

data.event: Yesterday February 17, 2006, the World Health Organisation officially declared presence of the H5N1 strain of the avian flu virus in Egypt.

event.title: February 18, 2006, a responsible source from Egyptian ministry of health announced

data.event: Today February 18, 2006, a responsible source from Egyptian ministry of health announced reporting of another 25 cases of infected birds in Al-Minya with aftermath of 35 confirmed cases between birds, yet there are no human cases reported.
